Title  : M890641 - Air Pollution Levels, Annual

SULPHUR DIOXIDE (MAXIMUM 24-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WORLD HEALTH ORGANISATION (WHO) INTERIM TARGET-2: SULPHUR DIOXIDE <= 50 G/CUBIC METRE (24-HOUR MEAN).
NITROGEN DIOXIDE (ANNUAL MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: NITROGEN DIOXIDE <= 40 G/CUBIC METRE (ANNUAL MEAN).
NITROGEN DIOXIDE (MAXIMUM 1-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: NITROGEN DIOXIDE <= 200 G/CUBIC METRE (1-HOUR MEAN).

PARTICULATE MATTER (PM10) (ANNUAL MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: PM 10 (PARTICULATE MATTER <= 10 MICRONS ) <= 20 G/CUBIC METRE (ANNUAL MEAN).  PM10 LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.

PARTICULATE MATTER (PM10) (99TH PERCENTILE 24-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: PM 10 (PARTICULATE MATTER <= 10 MICRONS ) <= 50 G/CUBIC METRE (99TH PERCENTILE 24-HOUR MEAN).  PM10 LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.

PARTICULATE MATTER (PM2.5) (ANNUAL MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - SINGAPORE SUSTAINABLE BLUEPRINT TARGET: PM 2.5 (PARTICULATE MATTER <= 2.5 MICRONS ) <= 12 G/CUBIC METRE (ANNUAL MEAN).  PM2.5 LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.

PARTICULATE MATTER (PM2.5) (99TH PERCENTILE 24-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO INTERIM TARGET-3: PM 2.5 (PARTICULATE MATTER <= 2.5 MICRONS ) <= 37.5 G/CUBIC METRE (99TH PERCENTILE 24-HOUR MEAN).  PM2.5 LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.

CARBON MONOXIDE (MAXIMUM 8-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: CARBON MONOXIDE <= 10 MG/CUBIC METRE (8-HOUR MEAN).  CARBON MONOXIDE LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.

CARBON MONOXIDE (MAXIMUM 1-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: CARBON MONOXIDE <= 30 MG/CUBIC METRE (1-HOUR MEAN).  CARBON MONOXIDE LEVELS IN 2013 AND 2015 WERE SEVERELY AFFECTED BY TRANSBOUNDARY SMOKE HAZE FROM OVERSEAS LAND AND FOREST FIRES.
OZONE (MAXIMUM 8-HOUR MEAN) - SINGAPORE'S AIR QUALITY TARGETS BY 2020 - WHO AIR QUALITY GUIDELINE: OZONE <= 100 G/CUBIC METRE (MAXIMUM 8-HOUR MEAN).
